bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Mary E. Teller. Testimony of E. Trainor
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: John Dugan came to my yard yesterday morning and said that Mary Teller has shot killed Frank meaning Franklin Teller I then went to the house of Mr Teller and saw him lying between the gate and house dead there was a gun lying about two feet from him cocked with new caps on it I dont think he could of fallen with the in his hands without it going discharging
I also saw a board about four inches wide and three or four feet long with blood on it lying near him
